turns.userPrompt:
Implement email notifications:
- Backend: Set up email service with Nodemailer (or SendGrid)
- Create notification system for:
  - Task assigned to you
  - Task due date approaching (24 hours before)
  - New comment on your task
  - Project invitation
- API endpoint to manage notification preferences: GET/PUT /settings/notifications
- Frontend: Settings page with notification toggles
- Email templates with HTML styling
